A car of mass \(m\) takes off from rest around a circular track of radius \(r\). Speeding up at a constant rate, the car takes \(t\) seconds to go around the track once. What is the magnitude of the net force \(F\) acting on the car at the end of the trip? In your answer, use pi for \(\pi=3.1415...\)
